Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: newspapers, A3 and A4 photocopier, CDs, DVDs, talking books, language tapes, pedometer loan, meeting room for hire and exhibition space. Activities include Baby Time for under 2s, Story Time for under 5s and Chatterbooks (aged 8-12 years). Provides 6 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office, internet access and a scanner available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-7.30pm, Tues & Fri 9.30am-5.30pm, Wed closed, Thurs 9.30am-7.30pm, Sat 9.30am-4pm (opening times); 2nd Tues in the month 4-5pm (Chatterbooks), Thurs 10.45-11.45am (Under 5s)
